|chip1 = Atheros;AR5212; |chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *"NL-5354MP+ ARIES2-1.00" and "701604080000" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device has two U.FL connectors.
